identified-content.person: GINSBURG, DR. ROBIN NINA (DR. ROBIN NINA MARKS)

block.p: Dr. Robin Nina Ginsburg, an ophthalmologist, and Dr. Charles Matthew Marks, a dentist, were married last evening by Rabbi Robert Rothman at the Essex House in New York.
The bride, 37, and the bridegroom, 42, have practices in New York.
Dr. Robin Nina Ginsburg, an ophthalmologist, and Dr. Charles Matthew Marks, a dentist, were married last evening by Rabbi Robert Rothman at the Essex House in New York.
The bride, 37, and the bridegroom, 42, have practices in New York.

The bride is also the director of vitreoretinal surgery at the Mount Sinai Medical Center in New York. She graduated magna cum laude from Wesleyan University and received a medical degree from Columbia. She is a daughter of Merle and Jerome Ginsburg of Armonk, N.Y.
The bridegroom graduated from the University of Florida at Gainesville and the New York University College of Dentistry. He is the son of Fay and Arthur Marks of Boca Raton, Fla.
